TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DisplayFormatAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定 ASP.NET 动态数据如何显示数据字段以及如何设置数据字段的格式。

span.span: Specifies how data fields are displayed and formatted by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此特性应用于数据字段时，必须遵循特性的使用准则。When you apply this attribute to a data field, you must follow the guidelines for the use of the attributes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 动态数据准则](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c563bbf3-feb9-484e-81d1-a585f1b0e192)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Dynamic Data Guidelines](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c563bbf3-feb9-484e-81d1-a585f1b0e192). ## Examples 此功能的在线示例，请参阅：[运行](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute)。See an online example of this feature: [Run](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute). 下面的示例演示如何使用以自定义格式设置数据字段。The following example shows how to use the to customize formatting for a data field. 该示例执行以下步骤：The example performs the following steps: - 实现元数据的分部类和关联的元数据类。Implements a metadata partial class and an associated metadata class. - 在关联的元数据类，它应用属性指定以下结果：In the associated metadata class, it applies the attribute to specify the following results: - 当数据字段为空时显示的文本"[Null]"。Display the text "[Null]" when a data field is empty. - 区域设置特定货币格式显示货币数据。Display currency data in locale specific currency format. - 以短格式 (mm/dd/yy) 显示日期信息。Display date information in short format (mm/dd/yy). 在编辑模式下也适用这种格式。This format also applies in edit mode. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/CS/product.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/VB/product.vb#1)] 要编译该示例，您需要以下各项：To compile the example, you need the following: - 任何版本的 Visual Studio 2010 或更高版本。Any edition of Visual Studio 2010 or later. - AdventureWorksLT 示例数据库。The AdventureWorksLT sample database. 有关如何下载和安装 SQL Server 示例数据库的信息，请参阅[Microsoft SQL Server 产品示例： 数据库](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases)GitHub 上。For information about how to download and install the SQL Server sample database, see [Microsoft SQL Server Product Samples: Database](https://github.com/Microsoft/sql-server-samples/releases) on GitHub. 请确保安装正确版本的正在运行的 SQL Server 版本的示例数据库。Make sure that you install the correct version of the sample database for the version of SQL Server that you are running. - 数据驱动网站。A data-driven Web site. 这使您可以创建数据库和包含要自定义的数据字段的类的数据上下文。This enables you to create a data context for the database and the class that contains the data field to customize. 有关详情，请参阅`Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`。For more information, see `Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site using Scaffolding`.

span.span: How to: Set the Culture and UI Culture for ASP.NET Web Page Globalization

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据字段处于编辑模式时，是否将 属性指定的格式设置字符串应用于字段值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formatting string that is specified by the property is applied to the field value when the data field is in edit mode.

value.span: 如果在编辑模式中将格式设置字符串应用于字段值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the formatting string applies to the field value in edit mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，由指定的格式设置字符串仅当数据绑定控件处于只读模式时，将属性应用于字段值。By default, the formatting string that is specified by the property is applied to field values only when the data-bound control is in read-only mode. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来设置日期信息的显示格式的数据字段处于编辑模式时。The following example shows how to use the property to set the display format for date information when the data field is in edit mode. 通过设置指定要使用的数据字段的数据字段格式属性。The data field format to use for the data field is specified by setting the property. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/CS/product.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/VB/product.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在数据源中更新数据字段时是否将空字符串值 ("") 自动转换为 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether empty string values ("") are automatically converted to when the data field is updated in the data source.

value.span: 如果将空字符串值自动转换为 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if empty string values are automatically converted to ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以输入字段值为空字符串。Users might enter an empty string for a field value. 使用属性指定是否为空字符串值自动转换为`null`时在数据库中更新数据字段。Use the property to specify whether an empty string value is automatically converted to `null` when the data field is updated in the database. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下对象显示`null`值作为空字符串。By default, a object displays `null` values as empty strings. 若要显示不同的值，请设置属性。To display a different value, set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用以启用到空字符串值的转换`null`。The following example shows how to use the to enable the conversion of empty string values to `null`. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/CS/product.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/VB/product.vb#2)]

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置字段值的显示格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the display format for the field value.

value.span: 为数据字段的值指定显示格式的格式设置字符串。

span.span: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the data field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚无特殊格式设置应用于该字段值。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that no special formatting is applied to the field value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定在显示的值的自定义显示格式对象。Use the property to specify a custom display format for the values that are displayed in the object. 如果属性未设置，而无需任何特殊格式显示字段的值。If the property is not set, the field's value is displayed without any special formatting. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). > [!NOTE] > 当属性是`true`，字段的值是 HTML 格式设置字符串应用之前，先编码为其字符串表示形式。When the property is `true`, the value of the field is HTML encoded to its string representation before the formatting string is applied. 对于某些对象，例如日期，您可能想要控制该对象使用的格式设置字符串的显示方式。For some objects, such as dates, you might want to control how the object is displayed with a formatting string. 在这些情况下，必须设置属性设置为`false`。In those cases, you must set the property to `false`. 默认情况下，格式设置字符串应用于字段值，其中包含的数据绑定控件时仅对象处于只读模式。By default, the formatting string is applied to the field value only when the data-bound control that contains the object is in read-only mode. 若要应用于字段值的格式设置字符串，当它们处于编辑模式时，设置属性设置为`true`。To apply the formatting string to field values when they are in edit mode, set the property to `true`. 格式设置字符串可以是任何文本字符串，并且通常包含字段的值的占位符。The formatting string can be any literal string and usually includes a placeholder for the field's value. 例如，在格式设置字符串"项值： {0}"，字段的值替换为{0}中显示字符串的占位符对象。For example, in the formatting string "Item Value: {0}", the field's value is substituted for the {0} placeholder when the string is displayed in the object. 格式设置字符串的其余部分将显示为文字文本。The remainder of the formatting string is displayed as literal text. > [!NOTE] > 如果格式设置字符串不包含一个占位符，从数据源的字段的值不包含在最终的显示文本。If the formatting string does not include a placeholder, the field's value from the data source is not included in the final display text. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来设置数据字段的显示格式。The following examples show how to use the property to set the display format of data fields. 第一个示例设置为货币类型数据字段的显示格式。The first example sets the display format for a currency type data field. 第二个示例设置为日期类型的数据字段的显示格式。The second example sets the display format for a date type data field. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/CS/product.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/VB/product.vb#3)] [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/CS/product.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/VB/product.vb#4)]

value.span: 如果字段应经过 HTML 编码，则为 ；否则为 。

summary.span: 获取或设置字段值为 时为字段显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for a field when the field's value is .

value.span: 字段值为 时为字段显示的文本。

span.span: The text that is displayed for a field when the field's value is .

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示尚未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时数据字段的值存储为源中的 null 值。Sometimes a data field's value is stored as null values in the source. 可以指定要用于通过设置具有 null 值的数据字段显示的自定义文本属性。You can specify custom text to display for data fields that have a null value by setting the property. 如果未设置此属性，null 字段值显示为空字符串 ("")。If this property is not set, null field values are displayed as empty strings (""). > [!NOTE] > 若要将空字符串字段值转换为 null 值，必须设置属性设置为`true`。To convert an empty string field value to a null value, you must set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来定义数据字段时显示的标题`null`。The following example shows how to use the to define a caption to display when the data field is `null`. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/CS/product.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayFormatAttribute/VB/product.vb#2)]
